Name: Ping
About the game: How long can YOU last against an onslaught of dots? Bring diamonds to the center. Ping! Use a shield or black hole thing! Diamond-matching dots will pop, Touch the rest: they will not stop! When you're done there's art to see- Compete for hi-scores locally! Includes 8 modes for colorblind, any less would be unkind: Achromatomaly Achromatopsia Deuteranomaly Deuteranopia Protanomaly Protanopia Tritanomaly Tritanopia
Meta Title: Ping: Jul 4, 2017, Examined Interactive and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Ping? Check out the release date (Jul 4, 2017), developer insights from Examined Interactive, and a complete game summary.
